ygData.subject: Re: Shadow knight quest
ygData.msgSnippet: North Freeport, im level 24 and groflah is about 22 i think. He hits very hard but i had clerical help i wouldnt attempt it until you think you can take him
ygData.messageBody:
North Freeport, im level 24 and groflah is about 22 i think. He hits very
hard but i had clerical help
i wouldnt attempt it until you think you can take him out.
